prompt: Dashcam footage from a trailing car on the PIE expressway in the early morning. Due to a sudden drop in visibility from dense fog, a white SUV fails to notice the vehicle ahead braking, causing a rear-end collision that demolishes its front end and severely crumples the lead car's rear.

A roadside surveillance camera captures a taxi on a downhill section of the CTE during an evening downpour. On the slick, rain-blurred road, the taxi's braking distance is insufficient, leading to it rear-ending a private car, with both vehicles sustaining minor damage and airbags deploying.

Aerial drone footage shows a sports car hydroplaning while speeding through a waterlogged area at a KPE tunnel exit after an afternoon thunderstorm, resulting in it rear-ending a truck and its front end wedging severely under the truck's rear.

From the rear-facing dashcam of the car that was hit, a sedan on Orchard Road slams on the brakes to avoid a pedestrian who suddenly dashed into the road. The following vehicle, failing to react in time, collides with its rear.

The dashcam of a small, fully-loaded cargo truck captures the driver's frantic shouts as the brakes give out completely on a downward-sloping bridge. The truck, unable to slow down, plows into a line of three sedans waiting at a red light.

Shaky smartphone footage from a pedestrian bystander near a construction site. A vehicle makes an emergency stop to avoid scattered bricks on the road, causing a following motorcycle to rear-end the car, throwing the rider.

In a black and white surveillance footage style, a delivery truck's tires skid on an oil slick while braking on a parking garage exit ramp in the early morning hours, causing it to rear-end a vehicle waiting for the gate to open.

A trailing car's dashcam on a national highway on a rainy night shows the car ahead hitting a water-filled pothole, causing a sudden tire blowout and deceleration. The trailing car then collides with the disabled vehicle.

Driver's first-person view (GoPro) shows a cycling team on Mandai Road near the zoo at dusk. The lead cyclist brakes hard to avoid a monkey that suddenly darted out, causing a chain-reaction of rear-ends and falls among the cyclists behind.

Passenger's smartphone footage from a car in the next lane on a highway at high noon. A small car ahead has a blowout, loses control, and rapidly slows down, causing a following heavy truck to rear-end it and push it forward for a considerable distance.
A dashcam on a windy day captures a piece of tile falling from a building's facade on an old city street, causing the car ahead to brake in panic. A following panel van then rear-ends the car.

A trailing car's dashcam at midnight on a surface street. The front wheels of the car ahead drop into a small, sudden sinkhole, causing the vehicle to stop abruptly and the following taxi to rear-end it.

Helmet camera view from a motorcycle on the ECP during a summer thunderstorm. Visibility is extremely poor due to the downpour, and the motorcyclist fails to see a car slowing down ahead, rear-ending the sedan and being thrown from the bike.

Internal surveillance view from a public bus, facing forward at a bus stop on a rainy day. A small car ahead suddenly brakes to avoid splashing pedestrians, and the bus rear-ends the car on the slick pavement.

Rear-facing dashcam of a car near the Geylang Serai night market. The car ahead slams on its brakes to avoid a food delivery e-bike driving against traffic, causing the car with the dashcam to rear-end it.

Cinematic slow-motion scene inside a tunnel at night. A sudden power outage plunges the tunnel into darkness. Lead cars instinctively slow down, causing trailing cars to collide in the pitch black, resulting in a three-car pile-up.

High-altitude drone footage captures a scene in the Tuas South Avenue industrial area amidst heavy construction dust. A lead vehicle slows down due to poor visibility and is rear-ended by a dump truck, whose cabin is severely crushed.

Camera from a building diagonal to an intersection during off-peak hours. A car hesitates and slows upon seeing a malfunctioning (flashing yellow) traffic signal, but an inattentive public bus driver fails to notice and lightly rear-ends the car.

High-altitude drone footage over Lim Chu Kang Road on a rainy day. A small truck, speeding through a waterlogged puddle, loses control, swerves across the centerline, and collides head-on with a sedan.

Dashcam of an oncoming car on a mountain road bend during the daytime. An SUV's steering system fails mid-turn, causing it to continue straight and crash into a truck coming from the opposite direction.

Black and white surveillance footage of a rural road during a downpour. The road's centerline is obscured by the rain, and a pickup truck mistakenly drives down the middle, colliding with an oncoming vehicle.
Dashcam of the car that was hit on a highway at high noon. A sedan's front-left tire blows out, causing the vehicle to veer sharply left across the central divider and crash head-on with an MPV.
At-fault vehicle's dashcam footage on a forest road at night. An RV swerves violently into the opposite lane to avoid a large animal, colliding with an oncoming motorcycle.

Roadside fixed camera shows a two-lane road on a foggy morning. A sedan attempts to overtake in the dense fog, misjudging the distance of an oncoming car, resulting in a catastrophic head-on collision.
Dashcam of a trailing car on a poorly maintained county road at night. A three-wheeled vehicle suddenly swerves into the oncoming lane to avoid a large pothole and collides with a sedan.

Tunnel exit surveillance camera at midnight. In a tunnel with no central divider, a sudden lighting failure plunges it into darkness. One car drifts from its lane and the two vehicles collide head-on.
Aerial drone footage over a national highway in the daytime. A sports car swerves sharply into the oncoming lane to avoid scattered metal parts on the road and collides with an oncoming fuel tanker.

At-fault vehicle's dashcam on a rainy day at the exit of a traffic circle. While accelerating out of the circle, a sedan hits an oil slick, fishtails into the oncoming lane, and its rear collides with the front of an oncoming car.
Oncoming car's dashcam on a two-lane road. A truck overtakes a cyclist but must swerve into the oncoming lane to avoid hitting them, resulting in a head-on collision with the car filming.

Passenger's smartphone video on an uphill road section. An old truck's engine suddenly loses power on the incline, causing it to roll backward out of control, veer diagonally, and strike another vehicle coming up the hill.
Intersection surveillance camera during rush hour. All traffic lights are out. A taxi and an SUV both proceed without slowing down, leading to the taxi T-boning the SUV, causing both to spin out.
Dashcam of the car that was hit at an unsignalized intersection. A sedan accelerates aggressively from a side street to avoid an e-bike and is T-boned by a truck proceeding straight on the main road.

Shaky smartphone footage from a pedestrian bystander at an intersection on a stormy night. A sports car runs a yellow light at excessive speed during a heavy downpour and collides with a vehicle that had just started making a left turn.
At-fault vehicle's dashcam on a foggy morning at a rural T-junction. A van pulls out from a side road in dense fog, failing to see an oncoming tractor on the main road, and is hit on its side.

High-altitude drone footage of a T-junction with traffic lights in the afternoon. A cement mixer truck fails to stop for a red light due to brake failure and barrels into the intersection, T-boning a passing bus.

Black and white surveillance footage of an icy intersection on a snowy winter day. A sedan, starting on a green light, skids on the icy road, drifts into the middle of the intersection, and is hit on the driver's side by a vehicle proceeding normally.

Cinematic slow-motion scene at an unsignalized intersection at midnight. The intersection lights are out, and two cars enter without checking for traffic, resulting in one car hitting the other's B-pillar.

Dashcam of the car that was hit inside a roundabout on a rainy day. A vehicle in the outer lane loses control on the slippery road and fishtails, its front hitting the side door of the MPV with the camera.

At-fault vehicle's dashcam at a T-junction in the evening. A motorcycle takes a wider than usual turn to avoid a large pothole while turning left, its path overlapping with a vehicle going straight, resulting in a collision.

Intersection surveillance footage, obscured by dust, near a construction site. The dust impairs visibility, and a sedan driver fails to see a dump truck running a red light, which then T-bones and destroys the sedan.

Aerial drone footage of an intersection. A cyclist, waiting at a red light, slips and falls on spilled ball bearings when starting on green. The rider falls in the middle of the road and is pulled under a bus making a right turn.

Shaky smartphone footage from a pedestrian bystander at an intersection. A wheel suddenly comes off a three-wheeled motorcycle while it is turning, causing it to lose control and slide sideways, hitting pedestrians waiting at the red light.
Passenger's view from a parallel vehicle at dusk on a highway next to a national park. An SUV swerves sharply to the left to avoid a large deer, sideswiping a sedan driving normally in the left lane.

At-fault vehicle's dashcam on a multi-lane city road at night. A novice driver oversteers while changing lanes to avoid a pothole they didn't see in time, sideswiping a vehicle behind it in the target lane.

Trailing car's dashcam at an elevated road merge point on a rainy day. A taxi accelerates too hard while merging, its wheels slipping on the wet road markings, causing it to slightly lose control and sideswipe an adjacent car.
Cinematic slow-motion during a blizzard on a multi-lane highway. A truck's body sways due to a gust of wind on the snowy road, and the rear of the truck sideswipes a small car that is overtaking it.
At-fault vehicle's dashcam at a market entrance. An e-bike suddenly darts out from the roadside, causing an MPV to swerve left to avoid it and sideswipe a bus driving normally in the left lane.
Dashcam of the sideswiped vehicle on a highway. The SUV on the left suddenly has a tire blowout, loses control, veers to the right, and sideswipes the sedan with the camera.

Aerial drone footage of a roundabout. A motorcycle in the inner lane hits a leaked oil slick, causing the rear wheel to slide. To stabilize, the rider instinctively adjusts steering, sideswiping a car in the outer lane.
Dashcam footage suddenly goes dark inside a tunnel at night. A sudden lighting outage causes a nervous driver to veer slightly, sideswiping another vehicle also navigating in the dark.
Black and white surveillance style footage on a multi-lane bridge on a foggy morning. A truck driver cannot see the lane lines in the dense fog and slowly drifts, sideswiping another vehicle.

At-fault vehicle's dashcam on a narrow two-lane road. Power steering suddenly fails, the wheel becomes heavy, and the vehicle sways while correcting its course, sideswiping the mirror of an oncoming vehicle.
Trailing car's dashcam on a highway. A sedan makes an emergency lane change to avoid a plastic barrel that fell from a truck, failing to check its blind spot and sideswiping a vehicle.
Mobile phone footage from a pedestrian on a suburban highway in the evening. An impatient sedan forcefully overtakes a tractor in the dust, misjudging the space in low visibility and sideswiping it.

Dashcam shows two parallel vehicles on a city road. The vehicle on the left passes over a significant section of subsided road, causing its body to suddenly sink and tilt right, sideswiping the vehicle with the camera.

Aerial drone footage over a commercial street. A small billboard falls, startling the driver of a convertible sports car who swerves sharply, veering out of their lane and sideswiping another vehicle.

Intersection surveillance at a multi-lane turning intersection. The traffic light is malfunctioning. Two vehicles turning left together in adjacent lanes get too close while trying to get ahead, resulting in a sideswipe.

Aerial drone footage gradually becomes clear in dense fog on a highway in the early morning. A lead car brakes suddenly due to the fog, and vehicles behind fail to react, leading to a pile-up of dozens of vehicles.

Surveillance from an overpass on a city ring road curve during a weekday morning. A truck leaks an oil slick, causing several following cars to skid, lose control, and collide with each other in a multi-car pile-up.

Dashcam of a vehicle stuck behind traffic on a highway during an afternoon thunderstorm. Extremely low visibility due to heavy rain causes one car to lose control, starting a chain of rear-end collisions.
Cinematic slow-motion on a highway. A truck spills a large amount of rolling pipes, causing vehicles behind to swerve and brake suddenly, leading to multiple rear-end collisions and sideswipes.

Aerial drone footage on a river-crossing bridge during rush hour. A fully loaded truck has a tire blowout, loses control, and stops sideways across the road, causing a pile-up as vehicles behind cannot avoid it.
Intersection surveillance on a windy day. A large billboard is blown down by the wind, hitting a car and causing the vehicles behind to brake hard, leading to a multi-car rear-end collision.

Surveillance at a tunnel entrance at night. The lighting in the long tunnel suddenly goes out. The lead car of a convoy brakes hard, and the following vehicles rear-end each other in the darkness, forming a long chain.
Trailing car's dashcam on a highway at night. A herd of deer suddenly crosses the highway, the lead car brakes hard, triggering a long chain of rear-end collisions.

Dashcam of a rear vehicle in a convoy on a long downhill section. A heavy truck's brakes fail, and it speeds towards a line of cars at a red light, continuously hitting and running over multiple sedans with catastrophic results.

Aerial drone footage of an S-curve after rain. The lead car loses control on the wet curve, and vehicles behind brake and swerve to avoid it, causing multiple cars to collide and rear-end each other in the confusion.

Top-down shot from a tall building at an urban expressway entrance during rush hour. A motorcycle illegally crosses the expressway, causing vehicles in multiple lanes to brake hard and triggering a three-lane multi-car rear-end chain.

Dashcam on a highway. A car gets stuck in a subsided area of the road and stops suddenly. The car behind swerves to avoid it, collides with a car in the adjacent lane, which in turn triggers a rear-end collision from behind.
Bus front-facing camera near a school after hours. A student suddenly runs out from behind a parked car, and a sedan is unable to brake in time, hitting the student.

View from a customer inside a coffee shop filming a city square crosswalk during a winter afternoon. A taxi drifts and loses control while turning on a snowy road, sliding towards the sidewalk and hitting pedestrians.
At-fault vehicle's dim dashcam footage on a residential road at night. A streetlight is out, and a food delivery e-bike, driving at high speed without its lights on, hits a pedestrian taking a walk.

Intersection surveillance on a downhill section. A truck's brakes fail, and it is unable to stop before the red light and crosswalk, running past the stop line and hitting pedestrians crossing the road.

Black and white surveillance footage at a park entrance on a foggy morning. A sedan driver's visibility is poor in the dense fog, and they fail to see an elderly person crossing the road, resulting in a collision.

Mobile phone footage from a pedestrian at an intersection. The traffic light is malfunctioning. A pedestrian mistakenly thinks it's safe to cross and is hit by a right-turning vehicle that has a blind spot.

Struck pedestrian's perspective (phone drop footage) at a bus stop on a rainy day. A motorcycle sharply turns to avoid a puddle, loses control on the slippery road, and crashes onto the platform, hitting the pedestrian.
Dashcam on a suburban highway at night. A driver is focused on avoiding a suddenly appearing animal and does not notice a pedestrian on the roadside, hitting them while swerving.
Roadside camera on a sidewalk at night. An electric scooter rides onto the sidewalk to get around a large pothole on the road and hits a pedestrian walking normally.

At-fault vehicle's dashcam footage on an urban expressway at night. A drunk person suddenly climbs over the guardrail and crosses the expressway. A high-speed sedan is completely unable to avoid them, resulting in a tragic collision.

Yellowish dashcam footage in an urban-rural fringe area in the evening. A three-wheeled vehicle's visibility is obstructed by dust, and it fails to see a pedestrian waiting for a bus on the roadside, hitting them.
Cinematic slow-motion on a bridge sidewalk in the winter pre-dawn. A bicycle loses control on the icy sidewalk, slips, and falls, knocking over a nearby pedestrian.
Intersection surveillance footage. A pedestrian crossing the road is tripped by a rope left on the ground and is then run over by a turning sedan.
At-fault vehicle's dashcam at a parking lot exit. A child suddenly runs out from a blind spot chasing a ball. The vehicle, just exiting, hits the child despite its low speed.
At-fault vehicle's dashcam at an intersection in the evening. An e-bike runs a red light and speeds into the intersection, where it is hit by a normally proceeding sedan and sent flying.

Action camera on a cyclist's helmet on an industrial area road on a weekend morning. The cyclist rides over a hard-to-see diesel spill, the tires instantly lose grip, and the cyclist falls into the motor vehicle lane and is hit by a following car.

Shaky smartphone footage from a pedestrian bystander on an urban-rural fringe highway in the evening. A motorcycle's visibility is obstructed by dust, and it fails to see a farm vehicle turning ahead, hitting its side and falling.
Intersection surveillance footage. A traffic light is malfunctioning, and both an e-bike and a sedan assume they have the right of way and proceed, resulting in the sedan hitting the e-bike.
Bicycle helmet camera on a city road. The cyclist suddenly swerves to avoid a glass bottle on the road, sideswiping a bus traveling in the same direction and falling.
At-fault vehicle's dashcam on an unlit road section at night. An e-bike without lights suddenly turns left from the darkness, and the sedan is unable to avoid it, resulting in a collision.

Dashcam with wipers moving constantly on a city street on a rainy night. A motorcyclist in a dark raincoat is not visible, and a turning sedan does not notice them, hitting the straight-moving motorcycle.

Motorcycle helmet camera on a county road at night. While driving at high speed, the motorcycle's wheel gets stuck in a large pothole, causing the vehicle to lose control, veer into the oncoming lane, and collide with an approaching vehicle.
Roadside camera at a downhill T-junction. A bicycle's brakes fail while going downhill. Unable to slow down, it rushes into the T-junction and is hit by a truck on the main road.
Dashcam on a neighborhood road at night. A sedan, reversing on the dimly lit road due to a streetlight failure, fails to see a bicycle without lights approaching from behind and hits it.
Motorcycle helmet camera on a country road at dusk. A dog suddenly runs out; the motorcyclist brakes hard and swerves, losing control, sliding, and hitting a tree on the roadside.
Dashcam on a one-way street. A sedan driving normally is hit head-on by an e-bike going the wrong way, resulting in severe damage to the e-bike.

Black and white surveillance footage of an overpass turn on a rainy night. A sedan, driving too fast, loses control and skids on the wet curve, its side hitting the outer guardrail and deforming the car body.

At-fault vehicle's dashcam on a highway exit ramp on a stormy night. In heavy rain, due to high speed and standing water, an SUV aquaplanes on the curve, loses control, and hits the concrete barrier on the outer side of the ramp.

Trailing car's dashcam on a highway. A sedan's left front tire suddenly blows out, causing the vehicle to veer sharply to the left, and the driver cannot control it, hitting the central median barrier.
Cinematic slow-motion on a mountain road at night. A pickup truck swerves sharply to avoid a wild boar that suddenly appeared, loses control, and hits the guardrail on the other side of the road.
At-fault vehicle's dashcam in a roundabout. A public bus's steering fails while entering the roundabout, making the turn impossible. It veers off tangentially and hits the central island's guardrail.
Aerial drone footage of a racetrack corner. A race car loses traction on a patch of leaked oil during a high-speed turn, spins out of control off the track, and collides with the tire barrier.
At-fault vehicle's dashcam on a city street. A sedan swerves violently to avoid a pedestrian running a red light, loses control, mounts the curb, and damages its tires and rims.
Dashcam on a national highway at night. A truck's right wheels hit a deep pothole at high speed, causing the vehicle to veer sharply to the right and destroy several dozen meters of the guardrail.
Blurry bridge surveillance camera footage in foggy weather on a flyover ramp. A sedan cannot see the ramp's curve in the dense fog, turns too sharply, and collides with the inner guardrail.

Dashcam view on a highway on a rainy day. A sedan driver panics and misjudges steering after being blinded by spray from a large truck, causing the vehicle to veer off course and collide with the guardrail.
Trailing car's dashcam on an expressway. A motorcycle performs an emergency swerve to avoid a wooden plank on the road, loses control, and hits the roadside barrier.

Roadside camera footage, affected by wind and sand, on a city ring road during a sandstorm. Strong crosswinds make a panel van unstable, blowing it off its lane and into a collision with the guardrail.

Dashcam view on an uphill curve. A manual transmission car's engine suddenly stalls, causing it to roll backward. The panicked driver loses control, and the rear of the car hits the guardrail on the curve.

Dashcam footage in darkness inside a tunnel curve at night. The tunnel suddenly goes completely dark. The driver, steering by instinct, fails to judge the curve's radius correctly and hits the inner wall.

At-fault vehicle's dashcam on a suburban county road at night. Driving at night, a private car suddenly spots a huge pothole and swerves sharply to avoid it, losing control and hitting a roadside tree, severely deforming the front end.
Roadside camera on a city road on a rainy day. A sedan, driving too fast in the rain, loses control while turning, fishtails, and knocks down a traffic sign pole.

Cinematic slow-motion at a T-junction at the bottom of a long downhill. A truck's brakes overheat and fail. To avoid entering the intersection, the driver chooses to crash into a thick tree on the roadside.
Dashcam with a complete whiteout view on a rural road on a snowy day. An SUV skids on the snowy road, veers off, and breaks a lamppost.
Dashcam on a national highway at night. A sedan performs an emergency evasive maneuver to avoid an animal crossing the road, loses control, runs off the road, and hits a tree.
Shaky smartphone footage from a pedestrian bystander on a city road. A public bus loses control after a blowout, slowly mounts the sidewalk, and is stopped by a lamppost.
At-fault vehicle's dashcam on a bend in winter. A sedan loses control on an icy corner, flies off at a tangent, and crashes into trees on the outside of the bend.
Dashcam in a residential area at night. A car swerves violently to avoid a pedestrian who suddenly ran out from the roadside, causing the vehicle to mount the sidewalk and knock down a lamppost.
Dashcam at a petrol station exit. A motorcycle's rear wheel slips on an oil patch while exiting, causing it to lose control, fall, and slide into the exit signpost.
Dashcam on a lakeside road on a foggy morning. A sedan drives too far to the right in the fog, unable to see the edge of the road, and the right side of the car scrapes along a line of trees.
Dashcam on an expressway. A sedan running over a metal part on the road causes a blowout. After the blowout, the vehicle loses control and hits a roadside traffic information gantry.

Surveillance video from a roadside shop on a windy afternoon. A billboard from an old building is blown off, landing on a moving convertible. The startled driver loses control, drives onto the sidewalk, and crashes into a shop's display window.

Aerial drone footage of a mountaintop restaurant parking lot. A driver mistakes the accelerator for the brake. The sedan crashes through the parking lot guardrail and hits the exterior wall of the restaurant on the cliff edge.

Surveillance from inside a toll booth at a highway toll plaza in the evening. A heavy semi-trailer truck fails to see the plaza in advance due to dense fog, cannot brake in time, and destroys a toll booth and a barrier gate.
At-fault vehicle's dashcam in a marketplace. A van swerves sharply to avoid a pedestrian running across the road, loses control, crashes into roadside stalls, and collapses a canopy.

News camera crew POV adjacent to a row of buildings. The ground beneath the road suddenly collapses due to excavation. A mixer truck half-falls into the cavity, tilts, and strikes the neighboring building wall.
Dashcam on a road beside a building. A car loses control after a blowout, mounts the sidewalk, and hits the building's facade.
Dashcam at an underground parking entrance on a rainy day. A sedan fails to brake in time on the slippery downhill ramp and hits the parking garage wall or roller shutter.
Phone footage from a passenger inside a car at a drive-through restaurant. The accelerator gets stuck while queuing, causing the vehicle to lurch forward and hit the wall of the pick-up window.

Footage from a residential balcony on a winter night with snow. A sedan skids on the icy internal road of the complex, the driver is unable to control it, and the vehicle crashes into the corner of an apartment building.
Shop surveillance camera at an intersection during rush hour. A heavy truck runs a malfunctioning red light, causing another car to swerve violently, lose control, and crash into a corner store.

Trailing car's extremely dark dashcam footage in a river-crossing tunnel at midnight. The lighting suddenly goes out completely. The driver of a sports car fails to see a broken-down truck ahead and rear-ends it at high speed, totaling the car.

At-fault vehicle's dashcam with complete whiteout on a highway on a foggy morning. Driving in dense fog, a sedan fails to notice a vehicle stopped ahead due to an accident, hitting it and causing a secondary accident.

Dashcam on a highway at night. A sedan driving at high speed fails to see large debris (like furniture) scattered on the road, hits the obstacle directly, severely damaging the chassis and losing control.

Dashcam with wipers moving fast on a city road on a stormy night. Visibility is obstructed by heavy rain. A car fails to see a vehicle broken down ahead due to flooding, resulting in a rear-end collision.

Dashcam on a national highway at night. A small car ahead has a blowout after hitting a pothole and stops in the middle of the road. A following truck is unable to brake in time and hits the stopped car.

Trailing car's dashcam on a mountain road bend with no shoulder at night. A car's engine dies and it stops on the bend without hazard lights. A motorcyclist fails to see the stationary car and collides with its rear.
Dashcam on a highway. A large tire detaches from a truck ahead and lands in the lane. A following sedan is unable to avoid it and hits the tire, sustaining damage.
Roadside surveillance on a city road. A small car gets stuck in a sinkhole, becoming an immobile obstacle. A following bus, due to a blind spot, fails to notice it in time and collides with it.
Dashcam during a sandstorm on a suburban highway. A small tree is blown down by the wind and is lying across the road. With poor visibility, a sedan hits the fallen tree.

Trailing car's dashcam on a highway at night. A truck ahead suffers a critical failure and rolls over, blocking the road. The following sedan is unable to brake in time and hits the overturned truck's trailer.

Cinematic slow-motion on a mountain road hairpin bend in the winter pre-dawn. A box truck brakes on an icy downhill bend, causing the vehicle's body to skid sideways and slowly tip over onto its side, spilling its cargo.

Fixed camera in a roundabout's central island in the afternoon. A flatbed truck's steering system suddenly fails upon entering, making the turn impossible. The driver applies the emergency brake, and due to centrifugal force, the truck tips over.
Trailing car's dashcam on a national highway at night. An SUV with a high center of gravity hits a deep pothole at high speed, causing the body to rock violently, lose its balance, and roll over.
Aerial drone footage over a highway. A large passenger bus has a front tire blowout at high speed, causing it to lose control, hit the guardrail, rebound, and roll over.
At-fault vehicle's dashcam on a highway on-ramp on a rainy day. A small truck, driving too fast on the wet, curved on-ramp, has too great a centrifugal force, causing it to roll over.

Dashcam on a sea bridge on a windy day. A container truck encounters a strong crosswind. The empty container has a large surface area and is blown off balance by the strong wind, causing it to roll over.
Trailing car's dashcam on a highway. An SUV runs over an obstacle (like a block of wood) at high speed, is launched by it, and loses balance upon landing, causing it to roll over.
Dashcam view of a bend on a rainy day. A truck loses control on an oily, wet corner, skids sideways, and rolls over.
Roadside camera captures a road where one side of a mixer truck sinks into a sudden ground settlement, causing the vehicle to overturn due to the large height difference on its sides.
Dashcam on a city road. An SUV swerves sharply at high speed to avoid a pedestrian running a red light, losing control and rolling over due to the excessive evasive maneuver.
Aerial drone footage over a desert highway. An off-road vehicle driving at high speed over sand dunes becomes airborne, lands unstably, loses control, and rolls over.
Dashcam on a rural road at night. A van swerves violently to avoid an animal, driving onto the soft and uneven road shoulder, which causes the vehicle to lose balance and roll over.

Roadside surveillance footage on an industrial park road. A tanker truck drives through a chemical spill. The chemical, a powerful solvent, rapidly degrades a front tire, leading to a sudden blowout and causing the truck to roll over.

News camera crew POV on a riverside road in the early morning. The roadbed, undermined by rain, suddenly collapses under a public bus, which half-falls into the collapsed area and runs into the roadside grass.

Aerial drone tracking shot on a coastal highway. A truck ahead drops a large number of boxes. An RV driver swerves sharply to avoid them, loses control, runs off the embankment, and comes to a stop on the beach.

At-fault vehicle's dashcam on a mountain road bend in winter. A sedan, driving too fast on the icy corner, is unable to turn and continues straight off the road at a tangent, falling down a small slope.
Trailing car's dashcam on a national highway on a rainy night. An accident occurs ahead, and to avoid it, a sedan swerves off the road and drives into a roadside drainage ditch.

Roadside camera at a T-junction. A truck's brakes fail, and it is unable to stop. The driver chooses to drive into the field opposite the intersection to use it as a buffer to stop, running off the road.
Dashcam on a highway. An SUV has a blowout at high speed, causing it to lose control, roll over multiple times, and run off the road.
Dashcam on a forest road at night. A sedan swerves violently to avoid a large animal, loses control, and crashes into the woods, running off the road.

Motorcycle helmet camera on a rural lane at night. The rider steers onto the shoulder to avoid a large pothole, but the soft shoulder causes the motorcycle to lose control and run into the adjacent field.
Dashcam on a bend on a foggy morning. A driver fails to see the bend in the dense fog, mistaking it for a straight road, and drives straight off the road into a ditch.
Dashcam on a bend. A sports car drives over an oil patch on the corner, causing the vehicle to lose control, spin, and run off the track into a gravel trap.
Dashcam at a tunnel exit at night. After driving through a dark tunnel with a lighting failure, the driver is suddenly faced with bright light, causing temporary blindness and driving off the road.
Dashcam on a suburban highway during a sandstorm. With extremely low visibility, a driver is unable to see the edge of the road, veers off, and gets stuck in the sand.

Dashcam of a vehicle on the road below, looking up at a multi-level interchange. A cement mixer truck suffers complete brake failure on a downhill curve, breaks through the guardrail, and falls from the overpass onto the road below.
High-altitude drone footage of a sea bridge on a winter night. A sedan, driving at high speed on the icy bridge, loses control, skids, breaks through the guardrail, and plunges into the icy water.

TV helicopter aerial footage of an old stone arch bridge. An overloaded truck drives onto the bridge, exceeding its load limit. The center of the bridge suddenly collapses, and the truck falls into the river with it.

Footage from a tourist's mobile phone on a boat below a coastal bridge during a typhoon. A panel van is hit by an extremely strong crosswind, is lifted, blown over the guardrail, and falls into the sea.
Dashcam on an overpass. A car has a blowout at high speed, loses control, hits the guardrail, and the immense impact flips it over the edge.
Trailing car's dashcam on an overpass at night. A motorcycle at high speed fails to see a large obstacle on the road, hits it, and the rider is thrown over the guardrail, falling to the ground below.
Surveillance camera under a bridge in dense fog. A car gets lost in the fog on an approach ramp, mistakenly enters an unfinished section of the bridge, drives straight off the end, and falls.

Chase scene perspective towards a broken bridge under construction. A car being chased has its brakes fail and is unable to stop, attempting to jump the gap but failing and plunging into the valley below.

Drone footage of a high mountain pass bridge at night. Due to a widespread lighting failure, a tourist bus driver misjudges the edge of the road, veers slightly off course, and drives off the side of the bridge.
Dashcam view under a construction crane. A large steel beam falls from the crane onto the bridge, causing a section to collapse, and a convertible falls with it.

Action camera mounted on a motorcycle's handlebars on an old, poorly maintained bridge. The motorcycle hits a large, deep pothole near the edge, the handlebars are wrenched from the rider's grip, and the loss of control sends both over the low guardrail into the river below.

Telephoto shot from a driver's mobile phone on the roadside of a highway. A sedan's undercarriage catches flammable material dropped from a truck, which ignites from friction. After pulling over, the fire engulfs the entire vehicle.

Owner's panicked phone video on a congested city street on a hot afternoon. Due to aging wiring in an old car, the engine overheats, causing an electrical short. White smoke appears from the hood, quickly turning to black smoke and then open flames.

Roadside surveillance of a parking lot. A car's old fuel line ruptures, and leaking gasoline comes into contact with hot engine components. A fire suddenly starts under the vehicle and quickly spreads to the entire car.
Cinematic slow-motion inside a tunnel. A public bus's engine overheats, seizes, and catches fire. Thick smoke quickly fills the tunnel as passengers evacuate, and the vehicle is consumed by flames.

Interior camera of an electric vehicle while driving. A thermal runaway event occurs in the battery, causing an internal short. Thick smoke and popping sounds come from the underfloor battery compartment, followed by fire.
Dashcam in an industrial area at night. A truck drives through a spilled chemical that is corrosive and flammable. The chemical reacts with the hot tires or exhaust, causing a fire.
News camera crew POV on a road. A sinkhole opens up, causing a fuel truck's tank to rupture as it falls. Sparks from the scraping metal ignite the leaking fuel.
Trailing car's dashcam on a highway. A car's detached exhaust pipe scrapes along the ground, creating sparks that ignite a minor oil leak from the engine, leading to a vehicle fire.
Intersection camera during rush hour. An old car, forced to stop-and-go repeatedly due to a malfunctioning light, has its engine overheat and catch fire in the middle of the crowded intersection.

Driver's POV in a heavily loaded truck on an uphill climb. The engine is under extreme strain, leading to a catastrophic failure where oil and other flammable fluids are sprayed onto the hot exhaust manifold, igniting a fire.

Thermal camera view from a fire department drone on an expressway shoulder at night. An older luxury sedan's catalytic converter malfunctions and overheats to an extreme temperature, igniting the car's underbody heat shielding and carpets, starting a fire that spreads rapidly.
Dashcam on a rural road. A tractor's exhaust pipe gets clogged with dry straw, and the hot exhaust ignites the straw, causing the vehicle to catch fire.

Tunnel interior camera shows a violent shake then signal loss late at night in an under-sea tunnel. An old fuel tanker's fuel system malfunction leads to a fire, which then heats the tanker, causing a violent explosion.
Roadside surveillance at a gas station. An electrical short in a car creates a spark during refueling, which ignites fuel vapors, causing the car and the pump to explode.

Cinematic slow-motion on a highway. An LNG bus has a blowout, causing the wheel rim to scrape the pavement, creating intense heat and sparks that ignite a gas leak, causing the storage tank to explode.

Dashcam on an industrial road at night. A truck carrying gas cylinders hits a large, sharp piece of metal debris, puncturing one or more cylinders. The leak is ignited by sparks, causing an explosion.

News helicopter aerial footage of a road over a gas pipeline. A sinkhole opens up under a heavy vehicle, rupturing the pipeline. Sparks from the vehicle ignite the leaking gas, causing a massive explosion.
Dashcam on a highway. A critical malfunction occurs in a hydrogen fuel cell vehicle's system, leading to a catastrophic failure and the rupture and explosion of the high-pressure hydrogen tank.

Roadside camera near a railway crossing during a storm at night. A fuel tanker driver misses the crossing signals in the pouring rain and gets stuck on the tracks. A high-speed train collides with the tanker, causing a massive explosion.
Drone footage in an industrial area. A car drives through a spill of a hypergolic (self-igniting) chemical. The chemical reaction ignites the car's tires and fuel tank, leading to an explosion.

Street-level surveillance on a city street. A heavy object falls from a building under construction and lands directly on a truck carrying explosives, detonating them and causing a devastating explosion.

Intersection camera at night. A malfunctioning traffic light causes a severe T-bone collision between a car and a tanker truck. The collision ruptures the tanker, and sparks from the crash ignite the spilled fuel, causing an explosion.

Security camera in an underground car park. An electric car with a faulty battery suffers a catastrophic failure while charging. The battery pack explodes violently, destroying the car and damaging the parking structure.
Dashcam on a highway. A tanker truck runs over a sharp piece of metal debris that punctures the tank. Flammable liquid leaks and is ignited by sparks, leading to a massive explosion.

From the at-fault vehicle's dashcam on a winter morning, a rear-wheel-drive sedan takes a snow-covered rural bend too fast, causing the rear to fishtail. Unable to recover, the vehicle veers off the road and slams into a pine tree, crumpling its front end.

Trailing car's dashcam footage on a highway at high noon captures an SUV's front-left tire blowing out at high speed. The blowout pulls the vehicle sharply left, the driver overcorrects, loses control, and the SUV rolls multiple times before crashing into the central divider.

A street-side shop's surveillance camera shows a city street corner during an afternoon downpour. A sports car accelerates too quickly into a turn on the waterlogged road, hydroplanes, and becomes unresponsive, careening off the road and smashing through the glass facade of a corner cafe.

Cinematic slow-motion at dusk on a suburban expressway. An MPV swerves violently to avoid a large dog that suddenly ran onto the road. The vehicle loses control, goes off the embankment, slides across the grass, and collides sideways with a lamppost.

Intersection surveillance camera during rush hour shows an urban intersection with malfunctioning traffic lights. An SUV runs the intersection and T-bones a sedan, sending it spinning into the rear of another car waiting at the light.

Trailing car's dashcam footage on a highway during a rainy night. A rear-end collision occurs due to extremely poor visibility, and the force of the impact shoves the lead car into the adjacent lane, causing it to sideswipe a vehicle traveling alongside.

High-altitude drone footage over a two-lane highway shows a heavy-duty truck's brakes failing. It rear-ends a small sedan, and the immense force pushes the sedan directly into the oncoming lane, where it collides head-on with a van.

From the at-fault vehicle's dashcam on a city road, the sedan hits a bicycle that suddenly darted out. After the collision, the sedan brakes to a hard stop, causing a closely following vehicle to rear-end it.

Telephoto smartphone footage from a driver on the roadside of a highway in foggy weather. An electric vehicle is violently rear-ended by a truck in dense fog, damaging the battery pack, which begins to smoke and then ignites a few minutes later.

Aerial drone footage over a national highway. A truck transporting paint swerves sharply to avoid a pothole, loses control, and hits the roadside guardrail. The violent impact causes paint cans to rupture, spilling colorful paint all over the road.

From the at-fault vehicle's dashcam on a rural lane on a rainy day. An old sedan loses control on a wet corner and slides off the road, hitting a tree. The impact damages the engine, and the car cannot be restarted.

Distant surveillance footage captures the flash of an explosion at an intersection at night. A traffic light malfunction causes a car to T-bone a natural gas taxi at high speed, damaging its tank and causing leaking gas to be ignited by sparks.

Intersection surveillance camera at a daytime intersection. A signal light malfunction causes a sedan and an SUV to collide in a T-bone impact. The impacted sedan loses control, spins onto the sidewalk, and is stopped by a large tree.
Tunnel surveillance camera footage suddenly goes black in a long tunnel at night. The lighting cuts out, the lead car brakes hard, and the following car rear-ends it, pushing it into the tunnel wall.

Aerial drone footage of an intersection with a reversible lane in the evening. Both the reversible lane indicator and main traffic light fail, causing two cars to enter the same lane from opposite directions and collide head-on, with one rolling over.

Dashcam view on a mountain road with no guardrails late at night. All streetlights are out. Two approaching cars sideswipe because they cannot see the lane markings, and one startled driver overcorrects, causing the vehicle to drive off the mountainside.

A trailing car's dashcam, with wipers at max speed, shows a highway during a downpour. An SUV loses control and rolls over while driving at high speed through deep standing water, then slides and crashes into a vehicle stopped from a previous accident.

A sand-covered roadside camera at a village intersection during a sandstorm. Strong crosswinds and low visibility cause a truck to lose control, run off the road, and hit a pedestrian who was taking shelter from the storm.

Aerial drone footage of an elevated road curve. A motorcycle hits a large oil slick on the curve, instantly losing all traction and sliding uncontrollably to the outside, with both rider and bike hitting the guardrail.
From the at-fault vehicle's dashcam on a highway in dense fog. An overturned truck from a previous accident is nearly invisible. The vehicle fails to spot it in time and rear-ends it at high speed.

Trailing car's dashcam on a highway at night. A sedan hits a mattress that fell from a truck ahead and brakes hard. After hitting the obstacle, the car comes to a sudden stop and is rear-ended by a closely following vehicle.
Roadside surveillance in a city area. A piece of building facade falls onto the road. A sedan swerves sharply to avoid it, mounting the curb and simultaneously sideswiping an adjacent car.

At-fault vehicle's dashcam on a suburban highway in the evening. The SUV changes lanes to avoid an animal, sideswiping a car in the process. After the sideswipe, the vehicle loses control and hits the guardrail on the opposite side of the road.

Intersection camera at a crosswalk. A van with a high center of gravity brakes hard and swerves to avoid a pedestrian running a red light. The side of the van hits the pedestrian, and the sharp maneuver causes the van to become unstable and roll over.

News helicopter aerial shot of a long downhill section. A heavy truck's brakes fail, causing it to speed into traffic. It rear-ends multiple vehicles before running off the road and crashing into a house.

Dashcam of the sideswiped vehicle on a highway. The SUV on the left has a sudden blowout, veers uncontrollably to the right, sideswipes the sedan with the camera, and then continues to lose control and runs off the road.

Passenger's smartphone video on an uphill road section. An old truck's engine suddenly dies, and it begins to roll backward without control. The rolling truck veers diagonally, hits an oncoming vehicle, and then rolls over from the impact.

Dashcam of the car that was hit on an expressway. A wheel detaches from a truck, flies across the median, and strikes the oncoming sedan. The out-of-control sedan is then rear-ended by the car that was following it.

Intersection surveillance footage. A signal malfunction causes a T-bone collision between a sedan and a truck. The impacted sedan loses control, is pushed onto the sidewalk, and strikes pedestrians waiting to cross.

Trailing car's dashcam on a city road on a rainy day. A sedan rear-ends a vehicle ahead on the wet road. The at-fault vehicle then swerves to avoid a second impact and drives into the bike lane, hitting a cyclist.

Shaky smartphone footage from a pedestrian bystander on a narrow street during a downpour. Two cars sideswipe each other due to poor visibility. One of the startled drivers mistakenly hits the accelerator, lurching the car into pedestrians taking shelter under an awning.
Aerial drone footage of a downhill section. A truck with brake failure rear-ends a sedan, pushing it forward into a motorcycle that was waiting to make a left turn ahead.
Oncoming car's dashcam on a national highway at night. A sedan loses control after swerving violently to avoid a pothole, crosses the centerline, and collides head-on with the oncoming car.

Trailing car's dashcam on a city road. One side of an SUV's wheels sink into a subsided section of the road, causing it to become instantly unbalanced and roll over. The following car is unable to stop and rear-ends the overturned SUV.

Roadside surveillance on a bend on a rainy day. A truck loses control after being launched by a water-filled pothole on a curve, drifts to the outside, and sideswipes a sedan driving normally in the outer lane.
Bridge surveillance camera on a bridge. A subsided expansion joint on the bridge causes a sedan to jolt violently, lose control, and hit the side barrier of the bridge.

Front and rear dashcam of a middle vehicle on a highway in the morning. In dense fog, the middle vehicle rear-ends the one in front and is then rear-ended by the car behind it, creating a 'sandwich' collision.

Roadside surveillance on a city road on a rainy night. A car makes an illegal lane change in the rain, sideswiping another car. The two cars stop, and a following vehicle, due to poor visibility, rear-ends one of them.

Aerial drone footage over a desert highway in the afternoon. A car overtakes in a sandstorm and collides head-on with an oncoming vehicle. Following vehicles with low visibility then crash into the scene, forming a multi-vehicle pile-up.

At-fault vehicle's dashcam on a highway late at night. The vehicle hits an overturned truck from a previous accident in dense fog. After the impact, a following car, also with poor visibility, rear-ends the sedan.
Dashcam on a national highway. A sedan swerves violently to avoid a large iron block on the road, loses control, runs off the road, and hits a roadside tree.
Trailing car's dashcam on a mountain road at night. An SUV swerves sharply to avoid a herd of deer, loses control due to the excessive steering input, rolls over, and hits the guardrail.
Roadside surveillance in a city area. A billboard falls from the sky, and the startled driver of a convertible swerves sharply, loses control, mounts the sidewalk, and crashes into a shop window.
At-fault vehicle's dashcam on a city street. An emergency swerve to avoid a pedestrian running a red light causes the sedan to lose control and hit the curb, damaging its tires and suspension.
Oncoming car's dashcam on a national highway on a rainy day. A sedan loses control after hydroplaning at high speed, crosses the centerline, and collides head-on with the oncoming car.
Trailing car's dashcam on a ring road. An SUV loses control and rolls over on an oily corner. After the SUV rolls over, a following vehicle is unable to brake in time and rear-ends it.

Roadside surveillance on a bridge in winter. A truck loses control on the icy bridge, causing the vehicle to jackknife. The rear of the out-of-control truck swings out and sideswipes a sedan in the adjacent lane.
At-fault vehicle's dashcam on a city road on a rainy night. A sedan loses control after swerving sharply to avoid a puddle, runs off the road, and hits a broken-down car parked on the roadside.
Intersection camera view. A signal malfunction causes a T-bone collision between two sedans. The impacted vehicle loses control, continues forward, and hits the roadside guardrail.
Trailing car's dashcam view on a rainy night. A rear-end collision occurs in the rain. The rear-ended vehicle is pushed forward, loses control, and hits a roadside lamppost.
Roadside surveillance footage of a rainy city street. A car loses control on the wet road, sideswipes another car, and the out-of-control vehicle then mounts the sidewalk and crashes into a shop.

Dashcam view on a highway. A car loses control after a blowout and sideswipes an adjacent car. The car with the blown tire continues to lose control and hits a vehicle stopped ahead due to congestion.
Aerial drone footage of a downhill road. A truck's brakes fail. To avoid hitting traffic ahead, the driver steers the truck off the road, eventually crashing into an abandoned building.
Trailing car's dashcam on a national highway. An SUV has a blowout at high speed, loses control, rolls over, and hits a roadside tree.
From the at-fault vehicle's dashcam on a road bend. The sedan's steering fails mid-turn, causing it to run off the road at a tangent and hit the guardrail.
Roadside surveillance on a city road at night. An electric car suddenly loses all power while driving, the steering wheel locks, and the vehicle runs straight off the road, hitting a lamppost.
A trailing car's dashcam captures city traffic. The lead car brakes hard to avoid a pedestrian, causing a rear-end collision. The rear-ended vehicle then loses control and runs off the road.
Intersection camera footage. A sedan makes an emergency lane change to avoid an e-bike running a red light. It sideswipes an adjacent truck, causing the sedan to lose control and roll over.

From the at-fault vehicle's dashcam on a highway at night. A truck swerves violently to avoid a pedestrian illegally on the highway, hits the guardrail, and then rolls over due to its unstable center of gravity.
Aerial drone footage of an intersection. A car accelerates out from a side street to avoid an e-bike, is T-boned by a car on the main road, and then loses control, running off the road.
Roadside surveillance on a city road. A public bus's tire blows out after hitting a large pothole. The out-of-control bus mounts the bus stop platform, hitting pedestrians waiting there.
Trailing car's dashcam in a construction zone. The road suddenly subsides, causing a mixer truck to become unbalanced and slowly roll over, crushing a bicycle in the adjacent lane.

Motorcycle helmet camera on a national highway at night. A sedan loses control after swerving to avoid a pothole. The out-of-control sedan veers into the oncoming lane and hits the normally proceeding motorcycle.
News camera crew POV on a riverside road. The roadbed collapses as a sedan passes over it. The vehicle gets stuck, loses control, and veers towards pedestrians walking by the river.

Surveillance camera under a bridge looking up. On a rainy day, a car is rear-ended by another on the slippery overpass. The impacted vehicle is pushed, breaks through the guardrail, and falls from the bridge.
Aerial drone footage of an interchange ramp. A truck with brake failure T-bones a sedan at the ramp junction. After the collision, the sedan tumbles and falls from the ramp to the road below.

News helicopter aerial shot over a sea bridge in dense fog. A multi-vehicle rear-end collision occurs. In the pile-up, a small car is sandwiched between two large trucks and is squeezed off the bridge into the sea.
Dashcam view on an overpass. A car suddenly changes lanes to avoid spilled cargo and sideswipes an adjacent car. The sideswiped vehicle loses control, hits the guardrail, and falls from the overpass.

Shaky smartphone footage from a pedestrian bystander on a highway. A sports car has a blowout at high speed, loses control, runs off the road, tumbles in the grass, and catches fire after landing due to a ruptured fuel tank.
Aerial drone footage of a mountain road on a rainy day. A fuel tanker loses control on a wet corner, runs off the mountainside, and causes a massive explosion upon impact with the ground.
Dashcam on a forest road at night. An off-road vehicle runs off the road to avoid a herd of deer, crashes into trees in the woods, and catches fire due to an electrical short from the impact.

News helicopter aerial shot of a downhill road section. A truck with brake failure steers into an emergency escape ramp, runs off the end, tumbles down a slope, and catches fire from the severe impact.

Trailing car's dashcam on a national highway at night. A truck transporting fruit swerves violently to avoid a large pothole, loses control, rolls over, and its full load of fruit spills onto the road.
Aerial drone footage of a highway ramp on a rainy day. A chemical tanker rolls over after driving too fast on a wet corner. The tanker ruptures, causing a large spill of toxic chemicals.
Roadside surveillance on a city road. A truck transporting sand and gravel loses control after a blowout, rolls over, and spills a large amount of its cargo onto the road.
Dashcam on a country road in the early morning. A milk tanker swerves sharply to avoid a herd of cows, loses control, rolls over, and spills a large amount of milk onto the road.

Surveillance camera under a river-crossing bridge in winter. A sedan loses control on the icy bridge, hits the guardrail, and the immense impact breaks the guardrail, causing the vehicle to fall into the river.

Aerial drone footage of a coastal highway. A public bus with brake failure is unable to slow down on a cliffside corner. The driver hits the guardrail, but the vehicle breaks through and falls into the sea.
Dashcam on an overpass on a stormy night. A truck aquaplanes in heavy rain, loses control, hits the guardrail, breaks it, and falls from the overpass.
Cinematic slow-motion at an interchange. A sedan loses control while trying to avoid spilled cargo, hits the guardrail, and tumbles off the interchange.
Dashcam on a highway. An SUV runs over a metal part at high speed, is launched by the obstacle, and loses balance upon landing, causing it to roll over.

Tunnel surveillance camera at night. Widespread lighting failure in the tunnel. A sedan hits a broken-down vehicle in the darkness. After the collision, the sedan loses control and crashes into the tunnel wall.

Roadside surveillance on a city road. A small car gets stuck in a sinkhole. A public bus hits this car. After the collision, the bus driver makes an evasive maneuver, loses control, and mounts the sidewalk.
Aerial drone footage of a highway in the morning. A truck hits a vehicle from a previous accident in dense fog. After the impact, the truck loses its balance and rolls over.

From the at-fault vehicle's dashcam in a city area. The sedan hits a pedestrian running a red light. The driver panics and mistakenly hits the accelerator, causing the vehicle to lose control and run off the road.
Roadside surveillance on a bend on a rainy day. A truck hits a bicycle on a wet corner. After the impact, the truck swerves sharply, causing it to lose control and roll over on the slippery road.

Intersection camera footage. A traffic light malfunctions, and a public bus hits a pedestrian who has entered the lane. After the impact, the driver swerves sharply, causing the bus to mount the median strip.

Dashcam view on a city road on a rainy day. A sedan hits a motorcycle while turning on a slippery road. After the collision, the vehicle loses control, veers to the side of the road, and hits a fire hydrant.

Aerial drone footage of a highway on a rainy day. A sedan loses control on the wet road, hits the side guardrail, is deflected back into traffic, crosses the centerline, and collides with an oncoming car.

Trailing car's dashcam on a national highway. An SUV loses control after a blowout and hits a roadside tree. After hitting the tree, it is deflected back into the middle of the road and is rear-ended by a following vehicle.

Roadside surveillance on a city road at night. A sedan hits the curb to avoid a pothole. After hitting the curb, the vehicle is deflected back into the travel lane and sideswipes a car in the adjacent lane.
Dashcam view of a narrow street. A truck's steering fails, causing it to hit a wall. The truck scrapes along the wall, and its rear swings out, hitting the side of a vehicle coming from behind.

Surveillance camera under an interchange. A truck's brakes fail on the top-level ramp, it breaks through the guardrail and falls. The falling truck lands on traffic on the lower level, causing a multi-vehicle pile-up.
News helicopter aerial shot of an old bridge. An overloaded truck causes the bridge deck to collapse. A following bus falls with the collapsing section and crashes into a house under the bridge.

Aerial drone footage of a double-decker overpass in winter. A sedan loses control on the icy upper deck, breaks through the guardrail, and falls. The falling sedan lands directly on a vehicle in the oncoming lane of the lower deck, causing a head-on collision.
Cinematic slow-motion on an overpass. A falling object from a crane causes a collision that throws a motorcycle off the overpass. The motorcycle falls into a park below and hits a tree.

Dashcam on a national highway on a foggy morning. An improper overtake in dense fog leads to a head-on collision between two sedans. The violent collision ruptures a fuel tank and causes a fire due to sparks.
Aerial drone footage of a highway. A fuel tanker's brake failure causes a multi-vehicle rear-end collision. In the pile-up, the fuel tanker is hit, leaks, and causes a large fire.
Roadside surveillance on a bend on a rainy night. A sports car loses control on a wet corner and hits the guardrail. The impact causes an electrical short, which in turn causes a fire.
Trailing car's dashcam on a highway at night. A sedan hits a fallen metal obstacle on the road. The impact punctures the fuel tank, and sparks from the scraping metal ignite the leaking gasoline.

High-altitude drone footage of a multi-lane overpass during winter morning rush hour. A car slows on an icy patch and is rear-ended. The impacted vehicle spins into the next lane, sideswipes another car, and is then pushed into oncoming traffic for a head-on collision.

News helicopter footage hovering in early morning fog over a highway. The lead vehicle brakes sharply entering a fog bank, and vehicle after vehicle plows into the one ahead, creating a kilometer-long pile-up of mangled cars.

Cinematic multi-angle switching at a busy downtown intersection. A heavy-duty truck's brakes fail on a downhill approach to a red light, rear-ending a sedan and propelling it into the intersection where it is T-boned by a bus. The bus then veers onto the sidewalk, striking pedestrians.

High-angle surveillance on an urban expressway. A crate of industrial ball bearings spills, and multiple cars drive over them, instantly losing traction. The vehicles sway, sideswipe each other, and pile up as following cars also skid into the wreckage.

Trailing car's dashcam on a highway with a median strip. A sedan loses control after a blowout at high speed, runs into the median, hits a tree but does not stop, and is deflected back into the oncoming lane, colliding with an approaching car.

High-altitude drone footage of a highway on-ramp on a rainy day. A panel van loses control and skids sideways while driving too fast on the wet ramp, rolls over, hits the outer guardrail, and continues to slide into a vehicle stopped from a previous accident.

Shaky smartphone footage from a pedestrian on a forest road at night. An off-road vehicle swerves sharply to avoid deer, loses control, runs off the road, hits several trees before stopping, and the violent impact ruptures the fuel line, causing a fire.

Surveillance camera on the road below an overpass during a blizzard. A sedan loses control, skids on the snowy bridge, veers out of its lane, hits the outermost guardrail, and due to its speed and angle, breaks through and falls from the overpass.

Distant surveillance footage of a highway at night. A sedan's brakes fail, and it rear-ends a fuel tanker at high speed. The collision causes the sedan's front to catch fire, which quickly spreads to the tanker, eventually heating and detonating the entire tank.

Tunnel entrance surveillance shows the screen shaking violently then going dark at midnight. The tunnel suddenly loses power, and a truck carrying dangerous goods hits a broken-down vehicle. The impact causes flammable chemicals to leak, catch fire, and eventually trigger a chemical explosion.

News helicopter aerial shot of an industrial park road. A tanker full of solvents swerves sharply to avoid an oil slick, rolls over, and sparks from scraping the ground ignite the leaking solvent, creating a running fire that leads to the tank exploding.

Montage of multiple surveillance angles at a gas station. A heavy object falls from a construction crane, hitting a car and causing it to lose control. The car crashes into a gas pump, starting a fire that spreads and eventually causes an underground storage tank to explode.
Dashcam on a highway. A car makes an emergency lane change to avoid spilled cargo, sideswiping an adjacent vehicle, which causes a following car to rear-end it, resulting in a three-car accident.
Intersection camera view of a city area. A car hits a pedestrian and brakes hard. After hitting the pedestrian, the car is rear-ended by two following vehicles in succession.
Aerial drone footage of a country road at night. A truck runs off the road to avoid an animal, hits a tree, causing its cargo to spill all over the place.

Trailing car's dashcam under an overpass. An object falls from the overpass, and the SUV in front hits it and rolls over. The SUV hits the falling object and rolls over; the following vehicle is unable to brake in time and rear-ends it.

Aerial drone footage of a highway on a rainy day. A multi-vehicle rear-end collision occurs in heavy rain. In the pile-up, a car loses control trying to avoid the accident ahead, runs off the road, and hits a roadside tree.
News helicopter aerial shot over a bridge in dense fog. A multi-vehicle rear-end collision occurs. In the pile-up, a truck is hit, loses control, rolls over, and hits the bridge guardrail.
Cinematic slow-motion on an overpass in winter. An icy road leads to a multi-vehicle pile-up. In the chaos, an impacted car loses control, veers towards the guardrail, and falls from the bridge.
Intersection camera on a ring road. An oily road surface leads to a multi-vehicle pile-up. In the pile-up, a car loses control, runs off the road, and hits a roadside building.
Trailing car's dashcam on a national highway at night. The lead car rolls over after hitting a severe pothole. The following car rear-ends it, pushing both vehicles into the roadside guardrail.
Aerial drone footage of a city road. A car swerves into the oncoming lane to avoid a sinkhole, collides with an oncoming vehicle, and both lose control and hit roadside trees.

Roadside surveillance on a bend on a rainy day. A car loses control after hitting a water-filled pothole on a curve, drifts to the outside, sideswipes an adjacent car, causing the adjacent car to also lose control and eventually roll over.
Dashcam at an intersection. A car loses control and enters the intersection due to a subsided road surface, is T-boned by a perpendicular vehicle, which is then pushed into a corner store.

Aerial drone footage of a highway. A truck's brakes fail, causing a multi-vehicle rear-end collision. In the pile-up, the truck itself also loses control, hits the guardrail, and eventually rolls over.

Trailing car's dashcam on a national highway. A passenger bus has a blowout, causing a multi-vehicle collision. In the chaos, an impacted sedan loses control, runs off the road, and hits a roadside tree.
Intersection camera in a city area. A public bus's steering fails, causing a multi-vehicle collision. After the collision, an out-of-control car mounts the sidewalk and crashes into a shop.

Bridge surveillance camera on an overpass. The lead car loses power, causing a chain of rear-end collisions. In the pile-up, a car is hit, loses control, breaks through the guardrail, and falls from the bridge.

Roadside surveillance in a city area on a rainy day. A car loses control on the wet road and sideswipes an adjacent car. After the sideswipe, the out-of-control vehicle mounts the sidewalk and hits a roadside pedestrian.

Aerial drone footage of an intersection. A signal malfunction causes a T-bone collision between a truck and a sedan. The collision causes the sedan to roll over, hitting a bicycle waiting at the intersection.
Dashcam on a national highway in dense fog. A rear-end collision occurs. The rear-ended vehicle loses control, veers to the side of the road, and hits a pedestrian walking on the roadside.

Oncoming car's dashcam on a two-lane road. A car has a blowout and veers into the oncoming lane. After the head-on collision, one of the vehicles loses control, runs off the road, and hits a motorcycle.
Bridge surveillance camera on an overpass on a rainy day. A sedan loses control on the slippery bridge, runs towards the guardrail, breaks it, and falls from the bridge.
Aerial drone footage of a multi-story parking garage. A sedan's brakes fail on the top floor. The vehicle is unable to stop, crashes through the wall, and falls from the building.
Cinematic slow-motion on a mountain pass road on a snowy night. A truck loses control on a snowy corner, rolls over, hits the guardrail on the cliffside, and falls into the ravine with the guardrail.
Dashcam on a riverside overpass. A sedan loses control while trying to avoid an obstacle, runs off the road, hits a tree, rolls over, and finally falls into the river from the overpass.
Intersection camera footage. A signal malfunction causes a T-bone collision. The impacted vehicle loses control, runs off the road, and hits a roadside tree.
Trailing car's dashcam on a highway on a rainy night. A rear-end collision occurs. The rear-ended vehicle loses control, rolls over, and hits the guardrail.

Roadside surveillance of a city area on a rainy day. A car loses control on the wet road and sideswipes another car. After the sideswipe, the out-of-control vehicle mounts the sidewalk and crashes into a shop.

Aerial drone footage of a national highway. A car has a blowout and veers into the oncoming lane. After the head-on collision, one of the vehicles loses control, runs off the road, and hits a lamppost.
Shaky smartphone footage from a pedestrian bystander on a highway. A sports car has a blowout at high speed, loses control, runs off the road, hits a tree, and catches fire.
Trailing car's dashcam on a bend on a rainy night. A truck loses control on the wet corner, rolls over, hits the guardrail, and catches fire due to a ruptured fuel tank and sparks.
Aerial drone footage of a downhill road section. A fuel tanker's brakes fail. The driver steers the vehicle off the road, it crashes into an abandoned building and catches fire.
Dashcam on a national highway at night. A sedan loses control while trying to avoid a pothole, runs off the road, hits a broken-down car, and catches fire.
Intersection camera view. A signal malfunction causes a T-bone collision. The impacted vehicle loses control, runs off the road, and hits a broken-down car parked on the roadside.
Trailing car's dashcam on a highway on a rainy night. A rear-end collision occurs. The rear-ended vehicle loses control, rolls over, and hits debris from a previous accident.

Roadside surveillance of a city area on a rainy day. A car loses control on the wet road and sideswipes another car. After the sideswipe, the out-of-control vehicle mounts the sidewalk and hits a telephone booth.

Aerial drone footage of a national highway. A car has a blowout and veers into the oncoming lane. After the head-on collision, one of the vehicles loses control, runs off the road, and hits a broken-down car.
Roadside surveillance on a bend on a rainy day. A sedan loses control on a wet corner, hits the guardrail, and veers towards a pedestrian walking outside the guardrail.
Aerial drone footage of a downhill road section. A truck's brakes fail. It runs off the road, knocks down a lamppost, and continues forward, hitting a bicycle in the non-motorized vehicle lane.
Trailing car's dashcam on a national highway at night. An SUV loses control after hitting a pothole, rolls over, hits a roadside tree, and affects a pedestrian resting under the tree.
Dashcam view of a city area. A sedan mounts the sidewalk to avoid an animal, hits the wall of a shop, and injures a pedestrian at the entrance.
From the at-fault vehicle's dashcam in a city area. The sedan hits a pedestrian running a red light. The driver panics, swerves sharply, loses control, runs off the road, and hits a tree.
Roadside surveillance on a bend on a rainy day. A truck hits a bicycle on a wet corner. After the impact, the truck swerves, loses control, rolls over on the slippery road, and hits the guardrail.
Intersection camera footage. A traffic light malfunctions, and a public bus hits a pedestrian. After the impact, the driver swerves sharply, causing the bus to mount the sidewalk and hit a building.
Dashcam on a city road on a rainy day. A sedan hits a motorcycle while turning on a slippery road. After the collision, the vehicle loses control, veers to the side of the road, and hits the curb.
Roadside surveillance on a ring road on a rainy day. A truck loses control, sideswipes another vehicle on the wet road, then rolls over, causing its cargo of chemicals to spill.

Aerial drone footage of a national highway. A truck has a blowout and veers into the oncoming lane. After a head-on collision, the truck, which was transporting fruit, rolls over, spilling its cargo all over the road.
Dashcam at an intersection. A signal malfunction causes a T-bone collision. The impacted truck loses control, runs off the road, and spills some of its cargo.
Trailing car's dashcam on a highway in dense fog. A rear-end collision occurs. A rear-ended truck loses control, rolls over, and spills its cargo of industrial raw materials.

Disaster movie style multi-camera edit of a multi-level city overpass during rush hour. A section of the overpass suddenly collapses, causing a fuel tanker to fall with it onto the traffic below, leading to a pile-up. The tanker ruptures, spilling fuel which is ignited by sparks, causing a massive explosion.

Pedestrian's phone captures a viaduct over a busy commercial district. The pedestrian walkway section of the viaduct suddenly crumbles. A public bus on the viaduct falls with the collapsing section, landing on shoppers below, triggering a pile-up on the street as the fallen bus catches fire.

Slow-motion close-ups in the style of 'Final Destination' on a double-decker bridge. A heavy truck hits a massive pothole, snapping the chains securing its steel coils. A giant coil rolls off, causing the truck to lose balance, roll over, break the guardrail, and fall to the lower deck, landing on a car and causing a pile-up.

Black-and-white CCTV footage of a highway next to a chemical plant pre-dawn. The road subgrade collapses as a tanker carrying liquid chlorine passes over. The tanker runs off the road, hits the plant wall, ruptures, and the resulting toxic gas cloud poisons nearby residents.

Drone FPV tracks an at-fault truck on a long downhill highway. The tanker's brakes fail, and it plows into slow-moving traffic, causing a massive pile-up. In the chaos, the tanker itself rolls over, rupturing and spilling gasoline, which is ignited by sparks, creating a sea of fire.

Dashcam from an oncoming vehicle on a national highway. A truck transporting live pigs suffers a tire blowout, veers into the oncoming lane, collides head-on with a car, and rolls over, spilling live pigs across the road. A loose pig then runs into the path of a motorcycle, causing it to crash.

Bridge surveillance camera on a major river-crossing bridge. A tanker carrying concentrated sulfuric acid has its steering lock up. It scrapes along the central divider, triggering a rear-end pile-up behind it. Eventually, the tanker overturns, spilling corrosive acid that eats away at the bridge and other vehicles.

A 'Final Destination' style depiction at a busy intersection. A rear wheel detaches from a truck and rolls at high speed, striking a car's undercarriage. The out-of-control car gets T-boned, causing a pile-up. Meanwhile, the original truck loses balance and rolls over.

Disaster film perspective on a highway in foggy morning. A massive pile-up occurs in near-zero visibility. A chemical tanker is breached. Survivors get out but are hit by other vehicles in the fog. The chemical cloud is ignited by a spark, causing an explosion.

Documentary style on a mountain pass highway during a week-long blizzard. A pile-up blocks the highway, and numerous vehicles break down. A responding snowplow slides off the road. A stranded driver, walking for help, is hit by another vehicle in the whiteout conditions.

Long-take drone shot from above a downhill, banked overpass. A car's oil leak causes a pile-up. A fuel tanker is hit, rolls over, and spills gasoline. The fuel mixes with rain, flows down the road, and is ignited by a spark, creating a river of fire.

Distant smartphone video captures a mushroom cloud during a severe sandstorm next to a grain silo. Low visibility causes a multi-vehicle collision involving a flour truck. The truck ruptures, releasing a massive dust cloud which is ignited by sparks, causing a fuel-air explosion that destroys the silo.

Police helicopter thermal imaging of downtown city streets at night. A police car's steering fails during a high-speed chase, causing it to sideswipe the suspect vehicle, which rolls over, triggering a pile-up. The out-of-control police car then veers off and crashes into a building.

News chopper tracks a police chase on an urban expressway. A getaway car's tire blows out after hitting a spike strip. The car loses control, rear-ends a civilian vehicle, runs off onto a crowded sidewalk hitting pedestrians, and finally catches fire.

Multiple street-level security cameras show a bank robbery getaway van hitting large debris from a construction truck. Hitting the debris causes the van to roll over into the oncoming lane, where it is struck head-on by a fuel tanker, which then explodes.

A mix of dashcams and shaky phone footage at a crowded intersection. A stolen dump truck's brakes fail during a police chase. The truck T-bones a car, runs off the road, crashes into a storefront, and its load of gravel spills all over the sidewalk.

Multiple angles from a scenic bridge overlook on a sunny afternoon. A tour bus's brakes fail on a downhill approach. The bus rear-ends a car, shoves it aside, runs onto the crowded overlook hitting tourists, then crashes through the railing and falls.

Street-level surveillance camera at a busy intersection on a rainy day. A truck slides through a red light and T-bones a car. The impact pushes the car off the road, where it strikes a parked motorcycle before finally crashing into the front of a cafe.

News helicopter footage of an intersection. A malfunctioning traffic light leads to a head-on collision between two cars. After the collision, one car veers off the road, hits a pedestrian on the corner, and the damaged engine catches fire.
Dashcam from a vehicle in a foggy morning pile-up on a highway. A cargo truck involved in the pile-up is pushed off the road, where it hits a parked maintenance vehicle and spills its load of gravel.

Trailing car's dashcam on a highway curve on a rainy night. A fuel tanker loses traction and rolls over. A following car rear-ends the overturned tanker. The impact ruptures the tank, spilling fuel which is then ignited by sparks.

News helicopter footage of a busy highway. A tire blowout causes a truck carrying logs to roll over, spilling logs across multiple lanes and triggering a pile-up. One of the logs rolls onto the shoulder, striking a highway maintenance worker.

Oncoming car's dashcam on a rural road at night. Hitting a large pothole causes a tanker truck to lose balance and roll over into the oncoming lane. The oncoming car collides head-on with it, the impact ruptures the tank, and the spilled contents ignite.
