Bridge surveillance camera at dusk. A truck driver swerves to avoid a deer, causing the truck to roll over and hit the guardrail, spilling thousands of marbles across the bridge, which creates a slick surface and causes a multi-vehicle pile-up.

Multiple security cameras at a gas station at night. A fuel tanker's brakes fail, causing it to run off the road and crash into the gas station building and pumps. The impact sparks a fire, leading to a massive explosion of the station's fuel reserves.

Drone footage of a road adjacent to a power substation on a rainy day. A truck loses control on the wet road, runs off, and crashes into a major electrical transformer pole, causing a fire which leads to an electrical explosion and a regional blackout.

News helicopter view of a mountain road during a blizzard. A fuel tanker driver loses sight of the road in a whiteout, runs off the road, and crashes into a remote lodge, spilling fuel that ignites and sets the building ablaze.

Dashcam on a forest road at night. A camper van swerves to avoid a deer, runs off the road, hits an embankment which acts as a ramp, and rolls over. The crash ignites the propane tanks inside, causing a large fire.

Railway crossing camera near an intersection. A malfunctioning traffic light causes a truck to T-bone a car, pushing it off the road and onto adjacent railway tracks. An approaching high-speed train then collides with the car, causing an explosion.

Street-level surveillance of a street market. A truck with brake failure rear-ends a car, pushing it off the road where it crashes through several market stalls before hitting a building, spilling goods everywhere.

Drone footage of a bridge on a rainy day. A car hydroplanes, causes a head-on collision, and the impact sends one of the cars careening off the road, through the guardrail, and plunging into the water below.

News report from an icy road during a blizzard. A multi-vehicle pile-up occurs. One car involved is pushed off the road, where it hits a stranded pedestrian trying to walk for help, and then breaks down from the damage.

High-angle surveillance camera of a highway interchange. A tire blowout causes a tanker carrying crude oil to lose control and roll over, spilling oil across the ramps. Following vehicles are unable to brake on the slick surface, causing a pile-up, and sparks eventually ignite the oil.

Dashcam from a car on the opposite side of a highway with a forested median. A logging truck's brakes fail on a downhill stretch. The driver steers into the median, crashes through trees, spilling logs. Some logs roll into opposing lanes, causing a head-on collision and subsequent pile-up.

News helicopter footage of a rural highway. A catastrophic axle failure on a double-decker livestock trailer causes it to detach and roll over, spilling cattle across all lanes. This causes a massive pile-up, and a rancher who gets out to help is struck by a swerving car.

First-person view from a hazmat responder's helmet cam in an industrial park at night. A chemical tanker suffers a complete electrical failure, runs off the road and tips over, spilling a corrosive chemical. A passing motorcyclist skids on the chemical and crashes, and sparks from the crash ignite the fumes.

A montage of multiple dashcams on a high bridge. A tire detaches from a semi-truck, bounces across lanes. A car swerves to avoid it, sideswiping an RV. The RV loses control, rolls over, and its momentum carries it through the guardrail, falling off the bridge.

Street-level surveillance on an urban expressway. A construction crane drops an air conditioning unit onto the road. The lead car hits it. A following truck rear-ends the car, causing it to roll over, which triggers a massive pile-up behind it.

News helicopter footage of an intersection. A malfunctioning traffic light causes a car to T-bone a logging truck, snapping the chains holding the logs and causing them to spill. A car in the opposing lane hits the logs, loses control, and rolls over.

Dashcam from a car several vehicles behind on a bridge at night. A bus hits a deep pothole, causing a tire blowout. The bus loses control, sideswipes a car, pushing it into the guardrail, and the bus then also hits the guardrail and its weight carries it over the edge.
